mapper.select: /* SQL ID : com.stock.sp.apiserver.system.login.dao.LginDao.selectUserEncPswd SQL 명: 사용자 패스워드 조회 */ SELECT TU.PSWD /* 암호화된 패스워드 */ FROM TB_USER TU WHERE TU.USER_ID = #{usrId} AND TU.STAT_CD = 'ACTIVE'

/* SQL ID : com.stock.sp.apiserver.system.login.dao.LginDao.selectUser SQL 명: 로그인할 사용자 조회 */ SELECT TU.USER_ID AS USER_ID , TU.USER_NM AS USER_NAME , TU.BAS_BRCH AS BASE_HQ_CODE , BRCH_CD.CD_NM as BASE_HQ , TU.LTNO_CITY_NM AS BASE_CITY_CODE , CITY_CD.CD_NM AS BASE_CITY , TU.LTNO_SGG_NM AS BASE_COUNTY_CODE , COUNTY_CD.CD_NM AS BASE_COUNTY , TU.LTNO_EMD_NM AS BASE_DISTRICT_CODE , DISTRICT_CD.CD_NM AS BASE_DISTRICT , TU.LTNO_LDONG_NM AS BASE_DONG , TU.AFLTD_CMPNY AS COMPANY , TU.EMPNUM AS EMPLOYEE_NUM FROM TB_USER TU LEFT JOIN TB_CD TC ON TU.STAT_CD = TC.CD AND TC.CD_GRP = 'STATE_CD' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CD BRCH_CD ON TU.BAS_BRCH = BRCH_CD.CD AND BRCH_CD.CD_GRP = 'BRCH_CD' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CD CITY_CD ON TU.LTNO_CITY_NM = CITY_CD.CD AND CITY_CD.CD_GRP = BRCH_CD.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CD COUNTY_CD ON TU.LTNO_SGG_NM = COUNTY_CD.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CD DISTRICT_CD ON TU.LTNO_EMD_NM = DISTRICT_CD.CD WHERE TU.USER_ID = #{usrId} AND TU.STAT_CD = 'ACTIVE'

/* SQL ID : com.stock.sp.apiserver.system.login.selectLoginUserRole SQL 명: 특정 사용자에게 할당된 역할 목록 조회 */ SELECT A.ROLE_ID , TR.ROLE_NM AS ROLE_NAME FROM TB_ROLE_USER_MAPG A INNER JOIN TB_ROLE TR ON A.ROLE_ID = TR.ROLE_ID INNER JOIN TB_USER TU ON A.USER_ID = TU.USER_ID AND TU.STAT_CD = 'ACTIVE' WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}

WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT TM.MENU_ID , TM.MENU_NM , IFNULL(TM.HPOS_MENU_ID, '#') AS HPOS_MENU_ID , TM.MENU_IDX , TM.MENU_NM AS MENU_PATH , TM.MENU_PATH AS MENU_URL FROM TB_MENU TM WHERE HPOS_MENU_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT TM2.MENU_ID , TM2.MENU_NM , TM2.HPOS_MENU_ID , TM2.MENU_IDX , CONCAT(C.MENU_PATH, ' > ', TM2.MENU_NM) , TM2.MENU_PATH AS MENU_URL FROM TB_MENU TM2 INNER JOIN dsi.TB_ROLE_MENU_MAPG TRMM ON TM2.MENU_ID = TRMM.MENU_ID AND TRMM.ROLE_ID = #{roleId} INNER JOIN CTE C ON TM2.HPOS_MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID ) SELECT MENU_ID , MENU_NM AS MENU_NAME , HPOS_MENU_ID AS PARENT_MENU_ID , MENU_PATH , MENU_IDX AS MENU_INDEX , MENU_URL FROM CTE MENU ORDER BY MENU_IDX, MENU_PATH
